titles.title: Better Tools to Lower Costs Act of 2019
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to eliminate the resource requirement with respect to subsidy-eligible individuals under part D of the Medicare program.
Better Tools to Lower Costs Act of 2019

bill.summary:
Better Tools to Lower Costs Act of 2019
This bill allows beneficiaries to qualify for low-income subsidies under the Medicare prescription drug benefit without having to meet certain resource requirements.
